definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1" else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This example will test for command parameters, and if it's true, then it will do anything you place in the "do" section of the "if statement". Parameters are variables that come after your command.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Help</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">USMA: Gives you ammo and USM</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">USMA</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:USM</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:UnyAmmo</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Function not found</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
